```{r}
suppressPackageStartupMessages({
  library("SummarizedExperiment")
  library("magrittr")
  library("plotlyutils")
  library("plotly")
  library("limma")
})
```


```{r, fig.caption = "Density plot of counts"}

mat <- assay(GBMdata) + 0.5
ind <- sample(1:ncol(mat), 30)
plotly_density(
    log2(mat[, ind]), 
    palette=colorspace::rainbow_hcl,
    xlab = "log<sub>2</sub>(reads + 0.5)") %>% 
    layout(showlegend = FALSE)

```
```{r, fig.caption = "Voomed density"}
plotly_density(
    voomed_GBM$E[, ind], 
    palette=colorspace::rainbow_hcl,
    xlab = "log<sub>2</sub>(normalised counts per million)") %>%
    layout(showlegend = FALSE)


```
